title: Enslaved Haitians Plan Uprising- identify concepts

content.question: Which of the following best describes the role of the Haitian Revolution in the history of the African diaspora?

choices.label: It failed and discouraged additional resistance movements by enslaved people.
It was the only resistance movement by enslaved people that successfully overturned a colonial government.
It was inspirational to the successful German Coast Uprising led by Charles Deslondes.
It was successful and marked the beginning of a long period of prosperity in Haiti.

content.answer: It was the only resistance movement by enslaved people that successfully overturned a colonial government.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
